dict.acceptation: 出价，投标；努力争取；喊价；叫牌；
恳求；命令；说（问候话）；邀请，致敬；
投标；力求，企图得到或赢得某物；企图(for)；

sent.orig: And in Group II we treat them with omeprazole(20mg,Po,bid,3 weeks).
sent.trans: 奥美拉唑组50例，给奥美拉唑20mg,Po,bid,共3周。

sent.orig: Finally, bid enterprise according to bid against order to undertake calling bid respectively.
sent.trans: 最后，投标企业按照投标逆顺序分别进行了唱标。

sent.orig: Your bid is the lowest evaluate bid.
sent.trans: 你方投标属最代审查合格标。

sent.orig: Chapter 2 " Tactics skill of bid and bid risk study "
sent.trans: 第2章“投标报价策略技巧与投标风险研究”

sent.orig: The bid preparation is the core of project bid.
sent.trans: 投标报价工作是进行工程投标的核心。
